attributes.action: Disband the "government" who supports a BREXIT referendum that was based on lies
attributes.background:
-A referendum deciding the fate of UK was based on lies.
-The government supporting it schedules the debate for the petition signed by over 5 Millions on 1st of April, as a joke probably
-Parliament voted against the government several times, especially on the deal/nodeal created by the PM

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

If you would like another general election you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
